subclassFeature.name: The Ruffian
entries: Quando c'è da spaccare teste e picchiare persone, i Ruffiani sono coloro a cui ci si rivolge. Questi bruti non saranno soldati professionisti, ma l'onore non fa vincere le battaglie, la violenza sì.

subclassFeature.name: Heavy Beating
entries: You can use {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|PHB|1} even when using {@filter non-finesse melee weapons|items|source=|type=melee weapon|property=!finesse|category=basic}.

subclassFeature.name: The Right Tools
entries: You gain proficiency with Mace and Hammer type weapons, medium armors and shields.

subclassFeature.name: Mean Mug
entries: A partire dal 3° livello si ottiene la competenza in {@skill Intimidation}, o la competenza in {@skill Intimidation} se si era già competenti, e si ha {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} sugli attacchi con armi da mischia contro {@condition frightened} bersagli.

subclassFeature.name: Menacing
entries: Starting at 9th level when facing down a ruffian, anyone might be surprised by their intimidating presence.

An enemy hit by your {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|PHB|1} will have to make a Wisdom saving throw against an 8 + your Str mod + proficiency, becoming {@condition Frightened} on a fail, when {@condition frightened} in this way an enemy will have {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|disadvantage} on their attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Brute Force
entries: A partire dal 13° livello hai imparato a sfruttare la tua forza grezza per fare prepotenza o estorcere denaro a chiunque tu ritenga opportuno.
You can use your {@classFeature Cunning Action|Rogue||2} on your turn to try to {@action shove} a creature within 5 feet of you with your brutish strength.

subclassFeature.name: Tying Up Loose Ends
entries: Diventate maestri nel concludere gli affari sporchi e nel risolvere le questioni in sospeso.
Quando si attacca una creatura {@condition prone} e l'attacco va a segno, si ottiene automaticamente {@quickref Critical Hits|PHB|3|0|critically hit}.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to half your proficiency modifier rounded down, you recover expended uses on a short or long rest.
